trans-unit.source: This class sends its data to either a <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Console" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 此类将其数据发送到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Console" /> 流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Stores a reference to either the standard console <see cref="P:System.Console.Error" /> stream or a custom <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 存储对标准控制台 <see cref="P:System.Console.Error" /> 流或自定义 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Stores a reference to either the standard console <see cref="P:System.Console.Out" /> stream or a custom <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 存储对标准控制台 <see cref="P:System.Console.Out" /> 流或自定义 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string that describes the contents of the call stack to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 将描述调用堆栈内容的字符串写入 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> 流中。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string that describes the current contents of the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 编写一个描述调用堆栈当前内容的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串将写入 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> 流中。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string that describes the contents of the call stack at the time the specified exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 编写一个在引发指定异常时描述调用堆栈内容的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串将写入 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> 流中。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the stream.
Writes the specified string to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符串写入流中。

trans-unit.source: The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串将写入 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> 流中。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the stream.
Writes the specified string to the stream, followed by the line terminator.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符串及其后面所跟的行终止符写入流中。

trans-unit.source: The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> stream.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串将写入 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out" /> 流中。
